#summary Information on how to obtain source code.

= Git =

Mirror on !GitHub. Easy to fork and contribute changes.

Web interface:
https://github.com/sibprogrammer/owp

Read-only checkout:
{{{
git clone git://github.com/sibprogrammer/owp.git
}}}

= SVN = 

Original SVN repository.

Web interface: http://code.google.com/p/ovz-web-panel/source/browse/

Read-only checkout:
{{{
svn checkout http://ovz-web-panel.googlecode.com/svn/trunk/ ovz-web-panel
}}}
